description: Developing a next-generation Realtor Platform powered by blockchain and AI to make property transactions faster, more secure, and more transparent. The platform features tokenized property listings, smart contract-driven deals, decentralized MLS capabilities, virtual tours, and AI-powered recommendations.
mission: Revolutionize real estate transactions through blockchain technology and AI, making property deals more transparent, secure, and efficient for all participants.
values: Innovation in blockchain and real estate technology
Transparency and security in all transactions
Decentralization and democratization of real estate

culture.collaboration: Cross-functional teams with strong engineering focus
culture.development: Continuous learning in blockchain and PropTech domains

workingStyle.hours: Flexible across time zones with core collaboration hours

growthPlan.expansion: Global market penetration starting with US and EU
growthPlan.teamGrowth: Scale from 15 to 50+ engineers over 18 months
growthPlan.technologyEvolution: Advanced AI features, additional blockchain integrations
growthPlan.partnerships: Real estate agencies, MLS providers, financial institutions
